Topic.Title: Obama Has ZERO Intention Of Resolving The "Fiscal Cliff"!!

Message.Msg: you mean that if the bush tax cuts expire AND the automantic spending cuts forced by the gop proceed, we go over the cliff. remember why the automatic spending cuts are required, right? because the gop threw a fit over the debt ceiling.... which, btw has nothing to do with the deficit, and the "debt" the idiot gop was grandstanding over is debt already owed, get it? has nothing to do with future spending...... BUT the gop threw a fit and threatend default on existing debt.... and the deal they forced on everyone is the automatic spending cuts they are the first to want to weasel out of. screw them, let their spending cuts gut the military......

Message.Title: a flock of private jets flooded into Boston. Big donors were gonna celebrate Mitt's win
Message.Msg: On Election Day, The Boston Globe reported, Logan International Airport in Boston was running short of parking spaces. Not for cars — for private jets. Big donors were flooding into the city to attend Mitt Romney’s victory party

Topic.Title: king bridbrain seabugger

Message.Msg: dear bird brain do you realize the $1.6 trillion is over ten years? did you miss it that the bush tax cuts just during his 8 years cost about that much, or more?(others say it was much more) and rightwing think tanks warned that the expiration of the bush tax cuts would amount to about $3 trillion tax hike over ten years. Is Letting the "Bush" Tax Cuts Expire the "Biggest tax increase in history"? "Allowing all of the tax cuts to expire would raise taxes by around 1.6 to 1.7 percent of GDP" By Gerald Prante (rightwing) Tax Foundation ( and fyi 1.6% of our current %16 trillion gdp is $250 billion a year or about $2.5 trillion in ten years...... and it would be higher since gdp will be higher) so yes this guy says letting the bush tax cuts exprire would be the biggest tax increase in history BUT YOU SAY obama is asking for MORE than the bush tax cuts....???? you are a LIAR and a tool and an ignoramus
